interface.description: Represents a recorder record video or audio streams.

field.name: Recording
field.description: If recording is being performed or not.

field.name: Time Left
field.description: Estimated Time Left of recording. If recording is indefinite, this field reports an estimation of how much can be recorded using current settings.

parameter.name: URL
parameter.description: URL of stream to start recording.

parametrizedCommand.name: Stop Recording
parametrizedCommand.description: Stops current recording, and names the recorded stream.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: Name of the recorded. If the parameter is the empty string, the recording is discarded. In a control form, the parameter must be validated using a `<regex>` validation rule so that only allowed characters and file names are accepted.
